EITHER: Chicken Breast Meat (57%), Water, Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Flour, Vegetable Oils (Sunflower, Rapeseed), Starch, Yeast Extract, Modified Starch, Salt, Spices (contain Allergen Ingredient: CELERY), Acidity Regulators (Sodium Carbonate, Trisodium Citrate), Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Gluten, Raising Agents (Disodium Diphosphate, Sodium Bicarbonates), Onion Powder, Garlic Powder, Spice Extract (contains Allergen Ingredient: CELERY), Stabiliser (Carrageenan), Dextrose, Flavouring.

OR: Chicken Breast Meat (57%), Water, Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Flour, Vegetable Oils (Sunflower, Rapeseed), Modified Starch, Starches, Yeast Extract, Spices (contain Allergen Ingredient: CELERY), Salt, Acidity Regulators (Sodium Carbonates, Sodium Citrate), Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Gluten, Raising Agents (Sodium Acid Pyrophosphate, Sodium Carbonate), Spice Extract (contains Allergen Ingredient: CELERY), Dextrose, Stabiliser (Carrageenan), Flavouring Preparation, Colour (Paprika Extract), Garlic Powder, Onion Powder, Emulsifier (Polysorbate 80), Rosemary Extract.

Prepared in the restaurants using non-hydrogenated vegetable oil.

EITHER: Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Flour (contains Calcium Carbonate, Iron, Niacin, Thiamin), Water, Humectant (Glycerol), Rapeseed Oil, Raising Agents (Disodium Diphosphate, Sodium Bicarbonate), Emulsifier (Mono- and Diglycerides of Fatty Acids), Stabiliser (Carboxy Methyl Cellulose), Yeast.
Potential Allergen Ingredient: N.B. May contain traces of sesame seeds*, milk, barley and rye.
OR: Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Flour, Water, Humectant (Glycerol), Rapeseed Oil, Emulsifier (Mono- and Diglycerides of Fatty Acids), Raising Agents (Diphosphates, Potassium Carbonates), Stabilisers (Sodium Carboxymethyl Cellulose, Cellulose Gum), Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Starch, Salt, Deactivated Yeast.
Potential Allergen Ingredient: N.B. May contain traces of sesame seeds*, milk, barley and rye.
*Please note all our buns, rolls, bagels, tortilla wraps and flatbreads are toasted in the same toaster as buns topped with sesame seeds.

Water, Rapeseed Oil (23.5%), Spirit Vinegar, Modified Maize Starch, Allergen Ingredient: Free Range EGG Yolk (3%), Sugar, Salt, Allergen Ingredient: MUSTARD Flour, Thickener (Xanthan Gum), Preservative (Potassium Sorbate), Lemon Juice Concentrate.

Water, Sugar, Glucose-Fructose Syrup, Modified Maize Starch, Spirit Vinegar, Red Chillies (3.5%), Salt, Vegetable Oils (Rapeseed & Sunflower), Garlic, Dried Chillies, Dried Red Bell Peppers, Acid (Citric Acid), Preservative (Potassium Sorbate), Colour (Paprika Extract), Thickeners (Xanthan Gum & Guar Gum), White Wine Vinegar.

item.description: Try crispy chicken breast with a sweet chilli sauce, cool mayo, lettuce and cucumber in a soft, toasted tortilla wrap. Wrap of the Day every Monday, Wednesday, Friday and Sunday!

footer.footer_name36: Allergy Advice: For allergens including cereals containing gluten see ingredients in BOLD
footer.footer_name41: We produce our food in kitchens where allergens are handled by our people, and where equipment and utensils are used for multiple menu items, including those containing allergens.  Although your meal is prepared with care, we cannot guarantee it will be allergen free, even after ingredients have been removed on request. While there are no nuts or peanut ingredients in the products listed we can’t guarantee that our food is completely nut or peanut free.
